params._bio: Biography or description of the nominated venue.
params._latitude: Latitude part of the venue's coordinates.
params._longitude: Longitude part of the venue's coordinates.

params._venueId: The unique identifier of the deregistering venue.

params.venueAddress: The wallet address of the venue.

returns.bio: The biography or description of the venue.
returns.latitude: Latitude part of the venue's coordinates.
returns.longitude: Longitude part of the venue's coordinates.
returns.name: The name of the venue.
returns.wallet: The wallet address of the venue.

params.nominee: The address of the venue being nominated.

params.tokenId: The token ID for which to set the URI

params._bio: The new biography or description of the venue.
params._latitude: New latitude for the venue's location.
params._longitude: New longitude for the venue's location.
params._name: The new name of the venue.
params._streetAddress: New street address of the venue.
params._totalCapacity: New total capacity of the venue.
params._venueId: The unique identifier of the venue.
params._wallet: The new wallet address of the venue.

acceptNomination(string,string,int256,in.notice: Accepts the nomination for venue registration by the nominated venue.

deregisterVenue(uint256).notice: Allows a venue to deregister itself from the registry.

getVenue(address).notice: Retrieves information about a venue by its wallet address.

nominate(address).notice: Nominates a venue for registration, utilizing a referral credit.

setTokenURI(uint256,string).notice: Sets the URI for a given token ID

updateVenue(uint256,string,string,addres.notice: Allows a venue to update their profile information.
